text: Ogoh ʙosed, ki dini xolis [va xoli az sirk] az oni Alloh taolo ast va afrode, ki ƣajri Allohro [dust va] korsozi xud intixoʙ kardaand [pindorason in ast, ki]: «Onhoro faqat ʙa in dalel meparastem, ki moro ʙa Alloh taolo nazdik gardonand [va manzalatamonro ʙestar kunand]». Alloh taolo dar mavoridi ixtilofason mijoni onon [va muvahhidoni rostin] dovari xohad kard. Be tardid, Alloh taolo kasero, ki duruƣgui nosipos ʙosad, hidojat naxohad kard
